title: Place Name Worksheet
description: Documents how a place name was created -- the technique used, source word(s), modifications made, and pronunciation. Place names can use events, people, suffixes/prefixes, or compound words.

naming_technique.description: Technique used to create this name

modifications_made.description: What was changed from the source

reason_for_name_change.description: Why the name changed (conquest, commemorating an event/person, weather phenomena, cultural shift)

named_after_person.description: If named after a person, who and why -- can retroactively create a world figure

x-cross-references.name-registry: Name is registered in the Name Registry
